div.p: I left my family when I was 11 so my mum and dad and brother, I had 3 brothers at the time, I left because my brother supported me
to leave the country because they all saw something and Albania at the time wasn’t really the place to be as a young kid so they
had the advice to come here and further my education and start my education and start a new life by myself which was very difficult
my carer she had only just started doing care work but she was great and you know she has helped me a lot in life
she has helped me a lot being independent, being myself, helping me, supporting me to make my own decisions if it’s bad you learn from it
and if it’s good how to better that and at the time that really helped me and going back to my family, my family is still living in Albania
I went back after 9½, nearly 10, years which was last year for the first time; being by myself here helped me a lot you know it made me
a better person than I think I would have been if I had my family around me you know because it made me make decisions by myself
it made me sort of discover what I can do by myself or who I can rely on, not rely on but sort of how much I can rely on myself
